author: BusinessGreen staff
title: 'I was totally sold on the purpose': Moving from the Royal Navy into renewable energy | BusinessGreen Interview
text:
Workforce 2030: Invinity Energy Systems procurement specialist Keagan Lumley reflects on his shift from working with nuclear energy as a submariner to storing renewables
BusinessGreen: What was your previous career and how did you get into it? Keagan Lumley: I actually started off doing joinery with my brother-in-law right after school, but I really wanted to travel...
